name: Borrowed Time (itch) (pypypy)
description:
Borrowed Time

A tiny shoot'em up made for the Go Godot Jam 2

Notes

This is a heavily rushed game considering I only joined the jam halfway through lol.  I tried to follow the theme but quickly realized there just wasn't enough time, so the game ended up not following the theme at all. The music are just my own unrelated music re-used for the game.

Game Length

5-10 minutes

Controls
  • You can only be hit 5 times before dying.
  • Move: WASD / Arrow keys
  • Interact: E
  • Advance dialogue: Space / Left mouse button / Enter
  • Open settings; ESC
  • Shoot: Left mouse button
  • Aim with your mouse
Credits
  • Everything: pypypy
